name: svanichkin_Store
summary: A simple but unusually powerful class for working with all types of in-app purchases (consumable, nonConsumable, autoRenewable, nonRenewing).
description: The class itself ensures that the application is unloaded or loaded, does all the necessary actions. When the class has downloaded the purchases, made the recovery of purchases and checked their relevance on the server Apple, the isReady property will become YES.
